    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78840</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Skeletal formula of a limonene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Skelettartige Formel eines Limonens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formule squelettique d'un limonène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fórmula esqueletal de um limonene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formula scheletrica di un limonene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σκελετικός τύπος limonene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fórmula esquelético de un limonene</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration showing the skeletal formula of limonene is used for an exercise in determining the number of moles of bromine that will add to one mole of limonene.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">addition reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bromine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">limonene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">skeletal formula</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung, welche die skelettartige Formel 
des Limonens zeigt, wird für eine Übung benutzt, wenn man die Zahl 
Molen des Broms feststellt, die einer Mole Limonen hinzufügen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montrant la formule 
squelettique du limonène est utilisée pour un exercice en 
déterminant le nombre de moles de brome qui ajouteront à un mole de 
limonène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração que mostra a fórmula esqueletal
do limonene é usada para um exercício em determinar o número das 
toupeiras do bromo que adicionarão a uma toupeira do limonene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione che mostra la formula 
scheletrica di limonene è usata per un'esercitazione nella 
determinazione del numero di moli di il bromo che aggiungeranno ad una
mole di limonene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση που εμφανίζει σκελετικό τύπο 
limonene χρησιμοποιείται για μια άσκηση στον καθορισμό του 
αριθμού τυφλοπόντικων του βρωμίου που θα προσθέσουν σε έναν 
τυφλοπόντικα limonene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración que muestra el fórmula 
esquelético del limonene se utiliza para un ejercicio en la 
determinación del número de los topos del bromo que agregarán a un 
topo de limonene.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hinzufügung Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
